caption.p: Cluster analysis of the medicinal plant use. Comparison among ethnobotanical works in Alpine and Prealpine regions. Traditional uses in Valmalenco (VM) and in neighboring areas. VV: Valvestino [ 19]; VSG: Val San Giacomo [ 13]; VF: Valfurva [ 3]; LS: Lombard Stelvio National Park [ 15]; WA1: Italian Western Alps [ 22]; WA2: Italian Western Alps [ 2]; NW: Italian North Western Alps [ 14]; VAR: Val Varaita [ 18]; TR: Tremezzina [ 17].
